The biggest thing I wonder is after a year or so of having various gaffes and statements taken out of context if he decided he no longer wanted to play that front-man role, said Danny Sullivan , the editor-in-chief of the SearchEngineLand news site. In his new role, Mr. Eric Schmidt indicated he will focus on meeting with Google Inc. 's business partners and government officials around the world.
